titles.title: O Lord my God a jealous God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O Lord my God a jealous God
The One who ransomed me
And set His love so strongly upon me
Who leads and guides through storms and tears
And in whose hands I know no fear
O God, I offer You this prayer

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
No other gods before You
No desire above You
Help my heart be near and never stray
On this throne I raise You
That all my life would praise You
I give my love unto a jealous God
